column1: What is the supreme law of the land?

column2: [sets up the government,defines the government,protects basic rights of Americans]

column2: [a change to the Constitution,an addition to the Constitution]

column1: What are two rights in the Declaration of Independence?

column2: [You can practice any religion or not practice a religion]

column1: What is the economic system in the United States?

column2: [Everyone must follow the law,Leaders must obey the law,Government must obey the law,No one is above the law]

column2: [the Speaker of the House,speaker of the house]

column2: [Citizens 18 and older can vote,You don't have to pay a poll tax to vote,Any citizen can vote]
